definitions.definition: A wave which breaks all at once, as opposed to breaking progressively along its length.

A sale in which all merchandise is sold, at whatever reduced price is necessary; especially, such a sale for the purpose of either dispensing with a discontinued product line or preparing to close down the store.

main_definition: ( surfing ) A wave which breaks all at once, as opposed to breaking progressively along its length.
secondary_definitions: ( retail ) A sale in which all merchandise is sold, at whatever reduced price is necessary; especially, such a sale for the purpose of either dispensing with a discontinued product line or preparing to close down the store.
